item.title: Making Varrock A Safe Zone [Pimp] Help Please
item.dc:creator: @tj007razor tj007razor
item.description:
@tj007razor wrote:

Ok I have a different souce, but I think this should work for you. What you need to do is open client.java and search for

public void checkwildy()

then under that add

if ((absY <= 3501 && absY >= 3381) && (absX <= 3274 && absX >= 3174)) { inwildy = false; }

not sure on the coords, but then search for

public void checkwildy2()

and under that add

if ((absY <= 3501 && absY >= 3381) && (absX <= 3274 && absX >= 3174)) { inwildy2 = false; }

now it should look something like this

public boolean inwildy = false; public boolean inwildy2 = false; public void checkwildy() { if ((absY <= 3501 && absY >= 3381) && (absX <= 3274 && absX >= 3174)) { inwildy = false; } else { inwildy = true; } }

and

public void checkwildy2() { if ((absY <= 3501 && absY >= 3381) && (absX <= 3274 && absX >= 3174)) { inwildy2 = false; } else { inwildy2 = true; } }

Read full topic
item.source: Making Varrock A Safe Zone [Pimp] Help Please
